resources.string: The Drug Expiry Checking app is a Prototype version for Nurses at Angelsea Hospital. It is intended that the app would provide insights into the use of a mobile automative system that supports Nurses and Staff at Angelsea Hospital, but in no way reflects the actual work-flow process. Systems change accordingly making older versions redundant â€“ Angelsea and Wintec | Te Pukenga take no responsibility of outdated information displayed on the app. Upon accepting usage of the app assures that you understand these conditions.
